::Blazer::

Blazer frowns, looking at Techy follow Berserk. "Maybe. We should start him 
out on training droids first, he might go too far with a real opponent."

The scientist frowns, looking at Berserk. "But we definetly shouldn't take 
him out, it could be dangerous at this stage. What he doesn't know might 
friten him, he might go berserk."

Blazer chuckles at his pun, watching Berserk.
